abstracts.cdata!:
The Export Sector Loan is part of a
            program of Bank support to the government's objectives
            of promoting efficient private sector development and
            increasing the effectiveness of public sector institutions
            so as to resume economic growth. The loan will support: (i)
            trade and customs reforms aimed at encouraging efficiency
            and expanding the tradeables sector; and (ii) the transition
            of Banco Nacional de Comercio Exterior (Bancomext), to a
            more efficient role in trade financing in a more competitive
            financial system, and provide financing for that role.
